Getting started.question: How do I import my external mutual fund investments?
Getting started.answerHtml: 1. Tap on the 'IMPORT' button below. 2. Now, tap on 'Connect with Google'.  3. Choose the email ID in which you receive statements of your external mutual funds.  4. Continue on with the next steps. Give permission to Groww to read your email.  In 1-2 days, you will be able to see your external investments on the dashboard. Your imported investments will be updated every 30 days.  Note: Groww does not have access to any of your emails except the ones that come from donotreply@camsonline.com and samfS@kfintech.com.  Groww can only read messages that are from CAMS and Karvy so as to be able to read the mutual funds' statements.

Getting started.question: What can I do with my external funds?
Getting started.answerHtml: Once your external funds have been imported to Groww, you can easily invest more, redeem, and start SIP in that fund. If your external funds are regular plan funds, you can even switch them to direct plan (zero-commission).

Getting started.question: What is Auto-Import via Gmail. Is it safe?
Getting started.answerHtml: Auto-Import via Gmail allows us to automatically import your external mutual funds. You do not have send us anything. It is safe and Groww does not have access to any of your emails except the ones that come from donotreply@camsonline.com and samfS@kfintech.com. Groww can only read messages that are from CAMS and Karvy so as to be able to read the mutual funds' statements.

Getting started.question: Can I import someone else's investments?
Getting started.answerHtml: No, you cannot import someone else's investments. To be able to import, the PAN number in your Groww account and the funds you are trying to import has to be the same.

External Funds.question: My external funds were not imported properly.
External Funds.answerHtml: Please contact us. We will resolve this issue as soon as possible.

External Funds.question: My issue is not listed here.
External Funds.answer: You can try searching for your issue. Alternatively you can raise a ticket with us. Our Customer Support champs will help you out in no time!
